security.string: System exit calls are not allowed
Static imports of the System class are not allowed
Imports of the System class are not allowed
Garbage collector access is not allowed
Security Manager access is not allowed
Security Manager access is not allowed
Java IO access is not allowed
Java IO access is not allowed
Java runtime access is not allowed
Javax swing access is not allowed (your AI doesn't need a GUI)
Java awt is not allowed (your AI doesn't need a GUI)
You aren't allowed to use unicode. We found "\u" in your code, which could be unicode
You aren't allowed to use unicode. We found "\0" in your code, which could be unicode
A while(true) is an infinite loop. Please do not enter infinite loops as part of your AI
A while (true) is an infinite loop. Please do not enter infinite loops as part of your AI
For security purposes you are not allowed to directly reference RaceCar. If this causes any problems please tell us in the code rally forums at http://ibm.co/coderally
You cannot use any com.sun classes as this presents a security vulnerability in advanced AIs. Please use an Agent AI if you would like to include any code in your AI.
